name: Swipe All-Over Hydrating Serum Concealer
about: What it is: A hydrating, non-comedogenic concealer that glides on like a serum and has medium-buildable coverage to instantly cover dark circles, redness, and blemishes and is safe for sensitive skin...Coverage: Medium..Finish: Natural..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates to keep skin looking supple, smooth, and bouncy..- Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract: Sooths and calms sensitive skin..- Lysine: Supports the production of collagen and repairs and prevents dryness...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Itu2019s weightless, easy to blend, and has a skin-like natural finish that doesnu2019t cling to dry patches. Swipe all over to visibly even skin tone and smooth the look of texture without silicones. Designed for sensitive skin, this non-irritating formula is fragrance-free, alcohol-free, and wonu2019t clog pores...Clinical Results:.Based on a third party clinical test with 35 people including those with sensitive skin:.-97%* agreed it visibly concealed dark circles.-96%* agreed it visibly smoothed skin.-100%* agreed it did not crease after application....CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates to keep skin looking supple, smooth, and bouncy. .-Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract: Sooths and calms sensitive skin. .-Lysine: Supports the production of collagen and repairs and prevents dryness...Water/Aqua/Eau, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Isononyl Isononanoate, Propanediol, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Sorbitan Isostearate, Magnesium Sulfate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Magnesium Stearate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Lysine, Magnesium Chloride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cassia Angustifolia Seed Polysaccharide, Centella Asiatica Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Punica Granatum Bark/Fruit Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Caffeine, Aluminum Hydroxide (CI 77002), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Swipe on directly with the applicator to cover dark circles, spot conceal, or for all-over coverage. .-Use fingertips, a brush, or beauty sponge to blend. ..Pro Tip: .-Select one shade lighter than your skin tone to brighten...Recycling Instructions:.-Unbox the product..-Flatten the unit carton..-Recycle. .-Swipe Concealeru2019s Earth-sensitive tube is made from 50 percent post-consumer recycled resin.

reviews.review_title: Glides smoothly, but has a slight sheen
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the Tower 28 concealer in KTown (during the winter time last year when my skin tone was lighter) and it matched perfectly. It does brighten the undereye and other areas of the face that I wanted to brighten a bit. The formula is a light serum, slight smell, and glides smoothly on the skin, especially the undereye. It doesn't look cakey after it sets nor does it dry out my skin. This concealer does give a slight sheen, which I'm not too much of a fan, however, with a little dusting of loose powder, it lessened the sheen. If you do use it on your face instead of foundation, which I did a number of times, it was a light medium coverage, but you can build it for more coverage. Did it crease on me? Yes, but only a little. Most concealers crease on me anyways, even if I lightly powder, however, this one creased less than others that I have used. I can't say if it has any flashback (for those who love to take selfies :) so I can't speak on that, however, when a concealer feels like nothing on my skin, even with 2 layers, and lasts more than 8 hours on me, even without powder, I will repurchase again. Only one star off because of the sheen, but overall, this is one of my favorite concealers.

I will give it 4 stars because this concealer works really well to set my eyelids for eyeshadow.  I put powder on top of the concealer, and then the shadow. reviews.review_text: After struggling with hormonal acne for years, I developed a fear of wearing makeup, convinced it only worsened my breakouts. Two years ago, I gave it up entirely, which led to a depressive disorder and isolation because showing my irritated skin was too embarrassing. I began to focus on repairing my skin barrier, and a few months later, my skin started to clear. I thought, u201cMaybe I can try makeup again?u201d but my intrusive thoughts kept me from feeling confident enough to do so.  This year, I started researching non-comedogenic products made for sensitive, acne-prone skin, and thatu2019s when I discovered Tower 28 Beauty. My life changed after purchasing the Swipe Serum Concealer. For the first time, I didnu2019t feel guilty, anxious, or overwhelmed about wearing makeupu2014it became a safe space for my thoughts. Now, I feel confident wearing makeup because of Tower 28. Iu2019ve embraced myself, found joy in wearing makeup again, and no longer feel the need to rush home to cleanse my face, worrying that it will cause more breakouts. I am so grateful for this brand. ud83dudc9c

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I went from having oily skin to developing a problem dry T-zone that no matter how much I moisturize becomes extremely dry throughout the course of the day. My longtime concealer was not cutting it anymore so I've been on the hunt for something that will work for dry skin. This concealer looked very promising. First, it goes on beautifully, provides excellent coverage that is indeed buildable, and gives a natural, skin-like appearance. My skin looks hydrated and dewy when I first apply and for most of the day after it has dried down. It also lasts really well throughout the day -- blemishes I'd covered in the morning are still completely covered and not noticeable by the end of the day. However, by the end of the day my usual dry patches do begin to show. This concealer is definitely performing better than my old one, but it hasn't completely solved my problem. I also think the shade range could be developed further. I have fair neutral skin that leans a tiny bit cool and initially I thought I wasn't going to be able to find an appropriate match for me b/c the 1.0 BH fair neutral shade looks VERY yellow before it dries down, and the next best shade was a light with neutral cool undertones that looks way too dark and orangey on me. I was happily surprised to see that 1.0 BH got a little darker and less yellow as it dried down and in the end is almost a perfect match for my skin tone. If you're struggling finding a good shade match, try swatching a few and wait until they dry down completely to see if they're a good match. I ended up using the light neutral/cool shade as a color corrector under my eyes before applying the fair neutral shade to brighten.

reviews.review_title: Creamy and Hydrating with Amazing Coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Since I was familiar with T28 products before the Swipe Serum Concealer came out, I had very high expectations for this product. And let me tell you ever since I started using this product, it has been the only concealer in my makeup bag and I do not see myself replacing it with another brand anytime soon. I am more than in love with this product because not only does it have great coverage, but the application feels smooth and lightweight. I used to use a brush to blend my concealer but with the serum-like feel to the product, I only use my finger to apply it. I actually find it better to apply the product with my finger since it has a very creamy formula. I have recommended this product to my best friends and my sister-in-law, and they still use it to this day. There's a reason why this product has amazing reviews- it has amazing results. 10/10 recommend this product if you are looking for a concealer that is hydrating, creamy, and lightweight but great coverage, and easy application!

reviews.review_text: I recently added Tower 28 Beauty's Swipe All-Over Hydrating Serum Concealer to my makeup collection, and it has quickly become one of my all-time favorite products! It  is a standout product that delivers on all fronts. Itu2019s hydrating, provides excellent coverage, and is gentle on the skin. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a high-quality concealer that doubles as a skincare product. This concealer has definitely earned a permanent spot in my makeup bag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: T28 knocks it out of the park again - this hydrating serum concealer went viral for a reason!! As the name suggests, the formula is very hydrating and smoothing.  It blends so nicely over other makeup and provides good coverage without being cakey. The serum aspect of this product helps reduce creasing and makes it feel super lightweight. The applicator picks up the perfect amount of concealer for me without me needing to wipe off any excess.  In the photo, Iu2019m wearing only T28 concealer in shade 7.0 K-Town and T28 SunnyDays Tinted Sunscreen in shade 20 Mulholland, to show how beautiful and natural the finish looks even without any other makeup. And for $22?? Itu2019s a winner all around. You wonu2019t be disappointed!

reviews.review_text: This is my favorite concealer! I have eczema and dryness around and underneath my eyes but because of the serum formula it doesnu2019t irritate or dry my under eyes out at all. Itu2019s the perfect concealer for covering blemishes as well because the concealer looks very skin like and doesnu2019t patch up over pimples like other concealers do. I always like to set this concealer with a powder and it lasts me all day!
